original_title: O Novo Palácio da Câmara dos Deputados
overview: The new Palace of the Chamber of Deputies of Rio de Janeiro, still unoccupied: exteriors, interiors and facilities. The Mass and blessing of the Palace celebrated by the Archbishop of Rio, D. Sebastiao Leme. Official inauguration; speech of the mayor Arnolpho Azevedo.
title: O Novo Palácio da Câmara dos Deputados
